lead_paragraph: Schneider surrendered three goals on 11 shots in the first period, and Columbus, led by Nick Foligno’s hat trick, continued its hot streak.

headline.print_headline: Blue Jackets Wallop Devils as Cory Schneider Is Pulled Early
headline.main: Blue Jackets Wallop Devils as Cory Schneider Is Pulled Early

snippet: Schneider surrendered three goals on 11 shots in the first period, and Columbus, led by Nick Foligno’s hat trick, continued its hot streak.
